summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHOURGLASS Veil Hydrating Skin Tint is lightweight skin tint that instantly boosts moisture levels by 52% for a dewy glow and provides a sheer veil of coverage for comfortable, all-day wear.
details: DetailsBenefitsInstantly boosts skin's moisture levels by 52% for a dewy glowLightweight, comfortable sheer coverageNon-comedogenicVegan and cruelty-free2023 Allure Best of Beauty WinnerKey IngredientsMeadowfoam Seed Oil: Replenishes with nourishing fatty acids to strengthen skin moisture barrier.Plant-Based Squalane: Provides protection against moisture loss to help retain skin's natural radiance.Naturally Derived Rambutan Blend: Increases hydration to boost moisture levels over time.Research ResultsClinically proven to boost skin's moisture levels by 52%*100% said this product feels lightweight93% said skin instantly looks and feels smootherAFTER 8 HOURS**90% said skin looks healthy all day*Based on a US clinical study of 33 participants**Based on a US consumer study of 33 participantsItem 2611435How To UseApply on the center of the face, chin, and forehead. Blend with fingertips, foundation brush, or sponge.Ingredients1: Water/Aqua, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Limnanthes Alba (Meadowfoam) Seed Oil, Propanediol, Squalane, C9-12 Alkane, Erythritol, Dicaprylyl Ether, Polyglyceryl-6 Polyricinoleate, Octyldodecanol, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Distarch Phosphate, Phenoxyethanol, Polyglyceryl-2 Isostearate, Magnesium Sulfate, Zinc Stearate, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Dehydroacetate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter Extract, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Coco-Caprylate/Caprate, Benzoic Acid, Propylene Carbonate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Dehydroacetic Acid, Lecithin, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol, Ascorbyl Palmitate, Nephelium Lappaceum Peel Extract, Citric Acid, Stearic Acid, Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891), Iron Oxides (CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499).*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Apply on the center of the face, chin, and forehead. Blend with fingertips, foundation brush, or sponge.

reviews.headline: Just what I was looking for.
reviews.comments: Lucky for me there is a color match. Texture, also, is right for me. Not too heavy looking, but just enough coverage.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend for a natural look
reviews.comments: This product is really great.  I don't wear foundation or a lot of makeup but wanted a hydrating pick me up for my daily wear.  This tint is lightweight, hydrating, and I love that it doesn't feel heavy nor greasy.  It lasts all day.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: Absolutely Love this Tint, completely do not compare to anything out there.  Light, silky and gives a nice even skin color.

reviews.headline: didn't get this for a fake review
reviews.comments: i purchased this with my own money didn't receive for free for a fake "good review" anyway i loved this product. it left my skin looking nice & healthy not heavy on my skin. shade match was perfect. i wore it will i cleaned my house and wore it outside in the heat and it stayed in place. if you're looking for light coverage this is it. it's an everyday skin tint for me. i'm 9 months pregnant and don't wanna wear too much makeup so this is perfect

reviews.headline: Not good for oily skin
reviews.comments: Feels heavy & Oily. Did not blend seamlessy into skin with brush or sponge. And oxidises.

reviews.headline: Love this tint
reviews.comments: Complimentary from hourglass I am very happy with this tinted moisturizer. It is perfect to wear in the summer months because it does not rub off. I really think this is also perfect for acne prone skin because it does not irritate me at all.

reviews.headline: skin tint
reviews.comments: I recently was gifted by Hourglass their Veil Hydrating Skin Tint and I love it. It has such a natural finish and blends into my skin flawlessly. I have replaced my foundation and use this on my more casual days

reviews.headline: Love
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this skin tint. The how to find your shade to is super accurate and overall it's just perfect for summer! Light weight and glowy! This was gifted by hourglass in exchange for my honest review but this is also my fourth bottle so that should tell you something

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I received Veil Hydrating Skin Tint Complimentary from hourglasscosmetics. Great Sheer coverage for the summer. Super moisturizing with a matte finish. It gives my skin a beautiful and natural finish that looks fresh and radiant.

reviews.headline: Perfect for beach vacation!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product!! I've been wearing it on vacation and it's so good! It's very comfortable and lightweight and it looks like skin. This has been perfect for a little coverage during the day as well as a little glam beat at night. I would highly recommend this for everyday wear. Gifted by hourglass

reviews.headline: Love this skin tint
reviews.comments: I have been loving this skin tint !! It is super hydrating for my dry skin!! It also has a nice amount of coverage and is layerable ! Perfect summer essential! Can't wait to continue to use in my makeup routine! I received this complimentary from hourglass cosmetics

reviews.headline: Very lightweight
reviews.comments: This is very hydrating and lightweight. I prefer to use it as a tinted moisturizer and go about my day and the shade match is pretty good. I unfortunately might not purchase because I had a reaction to this and my face is super bumpy. This was gifted to me by hourglass Cosmetics.

reviews.headline: Good  one
reviews.comments: I'm obsessed with this skin tint! It's super lightweight, feels like nothing on the skin, and gives me the most beautiful, dewy glow. The coverage is sheer but perfect for those no-makeup makeup days — it evens out my skin tone, blurs little imperfections, and just makes my complexion look fresh and healthy. I also love how hydrating it is. My skin feels plump and moisturized all day, and it doesn't settle into fine lines or dry patches. Plus, knowing it's made with 94% naturally-derived ingredients like hyaluronic acid and squalane makes me feel even better about using it daily. Gifted by hourglass

reviews.headline: It's so pretty!
reviews.comments: I love how this looks on the skin! It gives such a natural finish that still lets me skin peek through a bit but evens everything out. It's not heavy at all and layers really beautifully under all my other makeup. Hourglass always makes the best makeup to give you that perfectly blurred and airbrushed look. Gifted by Hourglass

reviews.headline: Beautiful Complexion
reviews.comments: It takes just a small amount to get a lovely light coverage from this tint. It does hydrate and nourish my skin for hours after application. I love the balance it brought to my complexion most. I love the dewy glow that I'm left with and can't recommend this enough for others to try. Complimentary from brand.

reviews.headline: Stunning
reviews.comments: This is absolutely one of the best skin tints on the market. It leaves my skin just glowing and stunning. I find a lot of skin tints make my skin look or feel dry and this just is so hydrating and perfect. Love how light it feels especially for summer. If you have combo or dry skin this is for you. Gifted by hourglass.

reviews.headline: Love how this product feels on my skin
reviews.comments: This product is a 10/10 fits my complexion perfectly it applies smoothly/light on the skin,I was gifted by hourglass for my honest review.I would definitely recommend has now this product becomes one of favorite.

reviews.headline: Light and buildable
reviews.comments: In love with this skin tint. The best I have used so far. It blends in so seamlessly and gives such a nice dewy finish. It also buildable so your able to add foundation on top without a packed on look. Would definitely recommend. Gifted by hourglass

reviews.headline: Looove
reviews.comments: i love this!! This product was gifted by hourglass cosmetics I'm obsessed. There's a good amount of coverage with a glowy skin like finish. It looks stunning with my concealer and is definitely a lighter option perfect for summer and work!!

reviews.headline: Shiny
reviews.comments: Okay this foundation makes my skin shiny and glowing. This isn't a matte foundation! It makes me skin like dewy looking. Also I seen that it sits on top of my skin I'm not sure if it's because of a primer I've used or what. I feel like it does a good job evening my face and it covers my blemishes okay. It's definitely a buildable foundation Gifted by hourglasscosmetics

media.headline: The color match tool helped me find my perfect shade!
The color match tool helped me find my perfect shade!

faceoff_positive.comments: I have combination/oily skin but I love hydrating products because they don't accentuate my smile lines as much as mattifying products do. I recently got into skin tints as I am getting older and the cakey look isn't my thing anymore. I like looking more natural with a healthy complexion. This was gifted to me by Hourglass Cosmetics. First of all, this tint doesn't have much pigment so you can't expect even medium coverage specially if like me, you have dark spots. It is very light and has little coverage. However, I love it for myself as an every day base. I am tired of putting heavy makeup on like I said. This gives me a very nice healthy glow with minimal coverage so I do add concealer and do the rest of my makeup like I normally would and the final result is really lovely. I look healthy and I'm.not embarrassed of people looking at my face so up close as much. It wears of nicely, too. I think peope who like a natural look would love it specially if you have normal to dry skin. It didn't hold up as long on my combination skin but I didn't expect it to. I thought  I had picked a darker shade but I still went with it because I prefer a bit darker than lighter and to my surprise it matched very well to my skintone! It sort of adjusts to it because it doesn't have a strong pigment. You can use the 'Try it" option so you'll know how to find your shade for a good match.
faceoff_positive.headline: So light and good for no makeup/makeup

faceoff_negative.comments: I have no idea how this product receives such rave reviews. It's a moisturizer, and provides zero coverage. It's not makeup. I visited an Ulta store, where I told them what my goals are (light-medium coverage, natural look, friendly to my aging millennial skin, buildable coverage when necessary, etc). Kudos to the associate - They did color match me exactly. However, after using this product myself at home, it literally does nothing. I even purchased the Hourglass setting powder to finish off the look, to no avail. And not only that! I used my usual makeup routine over top (eyelid primer, eyeshadow, eyeliner), and this Skin Tint is so "moisturizing" that even with my tried-and-true eyelid primer, my eyeshadow and eyeliner were all but gone by the end of the work day. I also had to use A LOT of this product to achieve even just the slightest bit of coverage. When I use my tried-and-true BB cream, I use mayyyybe a few little dabs to get the coverage I'm looking for. Needless to say, this will be going back to the store. No idea how this product made it through the testing phase and onto store shelves. It needs to be rebranded as a moisturizer, because it's definitely not makeup.
faceoff_negative.headline: No Idea How This Product is so Highly Rated
